Welcome

We’re a church in the heart of London. We believe that God, the creator of everything, has revealed himself to humanity through the Bible.

So we meet on Sundays and during the week to study the Bible.

Our Meetings.

Our main meetings are on Sundays. We have two services, morning and evening. We also meet for midweek Bible studies, a monthly prayer meeting and run a lunch time service in Mayfair.

Morning // 10:15

Relaxed family worship, childrens’ teaching and sunday schools.
